title: SOLD: N28 Allen & Ginter John M. Ward
author: Rob D.

posts.post_title: SOLD: N28 Allen & Ginter John M. Ward
posts.post_content:
This is another card from a collection I'm selling that was tucked away for the past 30-40 years by an old-school collector who cared little to nothing about third-party grading, Internet chat boards and/or set registries. Last month I submitted some of the upper-tier Hall of Famers to SGC.

Price is $xxxx delivered within the United States. (Please note corner crease, upper left)

Check or money order preferred; PayPal is OK.

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes: 

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions.[/URL]

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com[/URL]
